question: 従業
sourceMnemonic: You must <kanji>obey</kanji> your <kanji>business</kanji>. When you're in this situation, you've found <vocabulary>employment</vocabulary> through them, which is why you must obey them (if you weren't employed, you wouldn't have to listen to them).
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
